CustomField.formula:
"your NVIDIA Partner Business Manager, " & AccountOwner__r.FirstName & " " & AccountOwner__r.LastName & " on " &
IF (ISBLANK(AccountOwner__r.Phone),(AccountOwner__r.MobilePhone),(AccountOwner__r.Phone) )
& " or " & AccountOwner__r.Email
CustomField.label: PBMDetailforCompTermination
